div.bibl: Radnik Vol. X, No. 93, April 21, 1927. NOTICE

body.p: The Jugoslav progressive club Milan Glumac is hereby advising its members and sympathizers that there will be a very interesting lecture given Thursday evening, April 21. The lecture will be held at the club rooms, 1703 S. Racine Avenue.
Subjects under discussion will be: Imperialistic War, Civil War, Revolution, and Counter-Revolution. Comrade George Bojanovic will lead in discussion.
All members and friends are urged to attend and hear this very important lecture.
